sql.trim: a.store_id AS "storeId", a.head_pic AS "headPic", a.logo AS "logo", a.banner AS "banner", a.name AS "name", a.product_count AS "productCount", a.is_open AS "isOpen", a.settlement_period AS "settlementPeriod", a.country_id AS "countryId", a.country_name AS "countryName", a.province_id AS "provinceId", a.province_name AS "provinceName", a.city_id AS "cityId", a.city_name AS "cityName", a.district_id AS "districtId", a.district_name AS "districtName", a.detailed_address AS "detailedAddress", a.store_tel AS "storeTel", a.store_qq AS "storeQq", a.store_wechat AS "storeWechat", a.seo_title AS "seoTitle", a.seo_keyword AS "seoKeyword", a.seo_describe AS "seoDescribe", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.bak1 AS "bak1", a.bak2 AS "bak2", a.bak3 AS "bak3", a.bak4 AS "bak4", a.bak5 AS "bak5", a.bak6 AS "bak6", a.bak7 AS "bak7", a.bak8 AS "bak8", a.bak9 AS "bak9", a.bak10 AS "bak10", a.industry AS "industry", a.store_type AS "storeType", a.level_id AS "levelId", a.industry_id AS "industryId", a.commission AS "commission", a.marking_img_path AS "markingImgPath",

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM store a
a.store_id in
#{item}
1=2

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM store a
${w.outputSqlOrderBy}
ORDER BY a.store_id DESC
